title: Las Iguanas
typeOfFood: Lacto, Beer/Wine, Mexican, Latin American, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. UK chain Latin American restaurant and bar. Veggie/vegan items labelled on main menu and has a separate veggie/vegan menu list with additional items. Lively trendy atmosphere. Happy hour cocktails.
streetAddress: Festival Terrace Southbank Centre, Belvedere Rd
